M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ProjectGameVer3.TestGame
 
Manticore - Class in ProjectGameVer3
 
Manticore() - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Manticore
Any Manticore initialized without any parameter will be a King Koopa with 35% dodge chance.
Manticore(int, String, int) - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Manticore
This initializes an Orc with name , Attack Power and max health points.
Manticore(String) - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Manticore
Any Manticore initialized with a name will be a Boss Monster with 55% dodge chance.
Monk - Class in ProjectGameVer3
The monk by default has a dodge chance of 33%.This is the specialty of the monk.
Monk() - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Monk
Default parameters for a Monk.
Monk(int, String, int) - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Monk
Initializes a Monk with an attack power, name and Max Health points.
Monk(String) - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Monk
Initializes a Monk with a name and default parameters.

Monster() - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Monster

Monster(String) - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.Monster
 
monsterChance() - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Encounter
This function generates 2 random numbers one for hero , one for monster and checks if all heroes have fainted and monsters have won.
